Golden Sands Hotel Apartments
7.3 Very good
Based on 1477 reviews

This is a good hotel for the price. It is well maintained and the staff are friendly and helpful. There's not much immediately around the hotel except a small super market and a pharmacy.

Taxi's do come by the hotel often, though, so you shouldn't have to wait long to grab a cab. It's about 15-20 minutes to Dubai Mall; 30-40 minutes to Jumeriah Beach. The rooms are nice and mostly quiet. Swimming pool is small, but it will cool you down on a warm day. Gym is nice. Breakfast buffet is sufficient. If you are traveling with two people, be aware that there is a bug in Agoda's system at the moment. I always book for two people, but when I got to the hotel, they said my breakfast voucher was for only 1 person. This has never happened before, and I've been using Agoda for about 8 years now. The receptionist said this has been happening frequently with Agoda bookings. The hotel couldn't rectify the situation, though. I had to pay 60 AED extra each morning for a second breakfast. I was told I have to deal with Agoda about the situation.

Show more
Thomas , United States
Shangri-La Hotel Dubai
8.7 Excellent
Based on 611 reviews

Overall, the hotel was a decent high level business class hotel. If you can get a room at a discount it is well worth the price.

If however, you are asked to pay the full price you would be better served finding another hotel. They call themselves a five star hotel, but they would more realistically be classed as a four star hotels. The Shangri la hotels in Asia are of a higher standard. If you are doing a one or two day trip to Dubai the hotel is well located to visit all of the sites but expect to take taxis everywhere...even to cross the street.

Show more
Matthew , Canada
AVANI Deira Dubai Hotel
8.3 Excellent
Based on 409 reviews

best small hotel in diera, right on the intersection of abu baker al sadeeq & khalid ibn al waleed streets.

very close to abu baker al sadeeq dubai monorail. five minutes walking distance only. the hotel is located near major shopping centers, all within minutes walking distance, such as hamar in the sameain & al gharair malls. many famous resturants are in the same vacinity. many authentic resturants are located in the first floor of hamar ain shopping mall. a famous iranian resturant is just opposite to the hotel. shops for kitchen & bathrooms are nearby, from faucets to tiles & all in between.

Show more
Adil , Qatar
StarMetro Deira Hotel Apartments
7.6 Very good
Based on 1381 reviews

I have been staying at this place for atleast 3 years on a row several times, but the service, friendliness of the staff has declined remarkably.

Amenities seems to be getting old as they don't work properly, the iron had calc residual which transferred to the shirt you would iron, the card scan on the door was broken, there was calc and other residuals in the shower, the shower head was not working properly, the water was either boiling or just out cold, the pans were quite oily and dirty, the TV has restricted channel options. There are not enough plugs around the room. The breakfast offer is quite mediocre - the Internet failed to work for a whole day - air conditioning was not working properly either - I complained about it several times but nothing really happened - this place will be ignored from me now on for sure

Show more
Farhan , Switzerland
Shangri-La Dubai Apartments
9.4 Exceptional
Based on 27 reviews

Carlton Palace Hotel
8.3 Excellent
Based on 816 reviews

Travelling alone to an unknown city can be stressful at times - not knowing the language, not knowing the streets and not knowing where to go - however, the staff at the Metropolitan Palace Hotel - in particular Mikaela were incredibly helpful, warm and friendly and thus made my journey a highly enjoyable one.

The location is maybe not so close to the most attractive parts of the city, however, just ten minutes away there are some excellent restaurants, the metro is nearby and there is a comfortable feel to the surrounding areas. I would highly recommend this hotel for people who want comfort and calmness rolled into one.

Show more
Gareth , Poland
Ramada Downtown Dubai
8.1 Excellent
Based on 1208 reviews

One doesn't often place Ramada in the same category of other big hotel names, but the Ramada Downtown Dubai holds it own very well.

These are beautiful one bedroom apartments (quite big) with full kitchen and the servicing of a hotel - the concept of apart-hotel. Location-wise it is in the ideal area near Mall of Dubai and Souq Al-Bahar. This is the new downtown area with many lovely apartment buildings and likely being transformed into the next entertainment (restaurant and bars) district of Dubai. Breakfast at the hotel is good - enough variety to let you start your day. There is a shared pool and gym with another apartment building next door. The staff strives to ensure you are looked after. Definitely a part of my preferred locations to stay in for future visits.

Show more
Fawad , Pakistan
Atana Hotel
8.4 Excellent
Based on 628 reviews

I book for this hotel for my. brother in 5 February to be from 6 /2 to 8/2 But I don't know how the book I g has been 6/3 to 8/3 I contact agoda to modify the booking And I say I willing to pay the difference in price if there is the hotel respond that's the booking cannot change and we cannot make upgrade for your booking and the hotel full It's big lay As I check I found the room available in agoda then I try to change the time of the booking for any time they still reject I think this hotel don't have any way to keep the customer loyle for sure I will never book this hotel again and I will never advise my friends to stay on it there are many option is better , and good rate omar

Omar , Oman
City Premiere Marina Hotel Apartments
8.2 Excellent
Based on 288 reviews

We had a pleasant stay in our spacious 2 bedroomed apartment. Housekeeping needed reminders to clean our room on a few occasions.

They came early and did not come back when we left the room. They came after phone calls even if it was 7pm. Experienced difficulty contacting reservations before arrival to arrange airport transfer. No response to request submitted on their website and no response to email address reservation. We tried calling several times and everytime no one was available and we had to call back. I asked a friend who resides in Dubai to contact reservation and after a few telephone calls she got through and only then my request for transfer was attended.

Show more
Najma , South Africa
DAMAC Maison Dubai Mall Street
7.5 Very good
Based on 238 reviews

The hotel is located is located near Dubai Mall, but no direct access to Dubai Mall, you only can go by Taxi, which will take around 6-7 min, but if they had road you can walk for two mins.

The photos proved in the website are not real they used the Photoshop. The room are not clean at all The stuff has no experience in how to support the client. In general not recommended hotel to stay in Dubai at all, you can find hundreds hotels for less money and better conditions and terms

Show more
Bassam , Greece
Park Regis Kris Kin Hotel
8.3 Excellent
Based on 580 reviews

The view of Sheikh Zayed Road is only available on Executive rooms and have to pay for upgrade. Best of luck trying to kill time and sleeping in the lobby if your flight arrives before 2 pm as they don't allow early check in.

Rude staff, have to phone room service a few times if your running low on the amenities provided. There is a night club on 3rd floor which has very loud music and can be heard on the lower level hotel rooms so if your with a family make sure you ask for high.

Show more
Imran , United Kingdom
Armani Hotel Dubai
8.9 Excellent
Based on 222 reviews

From the moment I entered to the time I left, absolutely everything was provided with care and attention to detail.

The overall design concept of the Armani is very in keeping with the Brand. The service was excellent and the staff cared themselves with professionalism and confidence. I would recommend the Armani to anyone wanting to spend a little to much but wanting to feel a little special.

Show more
Robert , Canada
Roda Al Murooj Hotel
8.7 Excellent
Based on 600 reviews

It was very near by Dubai mall, and I can go by walk without any worries. Staffs are very friendly and kind but it doesn't mean, that secure perfect service.

When I reserved the room, I requested king bed room and give us very quite room for the rest, but they said there's no room available and they didn't try to find or offer me a reasonable service, and they gave me twin bed room without any apologies. And in room, there are no sleepers (Is it right that this hotel is 5-star hotel??) and dental kit is also prepared for only 1 person. No free wireless is offered. But sauna, swimming pool and fitness room are well prepared and staffs are very nice and kind and it was really satisfied. But I don't want to stay here again and I will not recommend my friend to stay there. That amount of budget can find you more valuable place for cozy night.

Show more
CHAE , South Korea
The H Hotel
8.2 Excellent
Based on 294 reviews

the hotel's location is in the start of shk. zayed road, which the core business road in dubai. many hotels and restaurants are close and easy to reach.

dubai mall can be reached in 5 minutes too. the hotel is prestigious. i booked a deluxe room and it was spacious and nice room. it was very comfortable and the bathroom was wow and it has a tv in it but unfortunately was not working. the hotel staff were very friendly.

Show more
Mohammad , United Arab Emirates
Al Khoory Atrium
8.7 Excellent
Based on 453 reviews

Good service, facility and breakfast, just not so close to resturant and subway. The steet condition is bad, make it hard to walk to hotel from subway with lagguges.

MEI , Taiwan
Carlton Downtown Hotel
8 Very good
Based on 442 reviews

Front desk was very poor when it comes to customer service, i reached hotel around 6.30AM and requested for early check in, for which the staff replied that i have been checked in and the room is getting ready and will take one hour and suggested to have coffee at their cafe, i came back at 7.

30 AM, but the staff mentioned another 15-20 min, I went again to check at 8.00 AM, a new staff who replaced existing staff, to my surprise replied there is no room available and if i have to check in before 2pm, i have to pay AED 300, i told him that if thats the case then why i have not been informed first by his colleague, why it has been told me that room is getting ready, then this staff mentioned, he will get the room ready by 9.00 AM, i went out for a coffee again and came back again but no room ready and again waiting, i finally get the room at 10.15AM, thats after 4 hour of waiting. while i was waiting for these 4 hours, i have seen guests coming in for early check in and have been given room, to my surprise, one of the bell boy mentioned after seeing me waiting for 2 hours that the hotel is not even 50% occupied and plenty of rooms available, but he didn't understand why i havent been allocated room. Probably, because of nationality, gender, or mode of payment ( i paid through Agoda), well whatever it is my concern is if room is not ready and will be ready by when, or guest need to pay, it should be informed to guests. Room was big, comfortable and location was good. But i have decided not to stay again in this hotel and will also not recommend this hotel to my colleagues.

Show more
Amarjeet , India
Wyndham Dubai Marina
8.2 Excellent
Based on 137 reviews

After spending 1 week in adverage accommodation at the other side of Dubai my partner and I were very much looking forward to staying at the Wyndham.

The overall experience at the Wyndham was fantastic. We enjoyed the buffet breakfast as it had a large variety of food on offer. We also ate at the Range restaurant 1 night, i had the fillet steak and my partner the Tuna, both dishes were very good. As for location the hotel us just 10minutes walk to the beach and the marina is just a few minutes away. We enjoyed walking around the Marina in the evening before dinner. Our room was on the 28th floor and over looked the pool area. The room was peaceful at night and cleaned on a daily basis. For what we paid for our stay we can not complain, great value for money. We will definatley recommend the hotel to our friends and family.

Show more
Gemma , United Kingdom
dusitD2 kenz hotel dubai
9.2 Exceptional
Based on 81 reviews

First time i had visited Dubai and I thought Dusit D2 was a fantastic affordable Hotel to stay in. It is a new hotel approx.

1 year old situated in Dubai Internet City area. The location is Conveniently 2 minutes’ walk away easy access to the Metro system to use to explore Dubai. What made Dusit D2 special was the staff, all the staff were helpful and showed so much loyalty, hospitality and passion about their work – Happy people good Job a great team effort. The Front receptionist lady “Maya’ was fantastic showing her great hospitality skills in “Check In” and explaining the things to do and see in Dubai ... keep up the good work paulelliottking@yahoo.com

Show more
Paul , United Kingdom
Royal Rose Hotel
8.7 Excellent
Based on 393 reviews

I booked 2 nights at this hotel 11 to 13 Oct 2015, I arrived at around 2200 and was welcomed with a refreshing cold fresh fragrance d tea.

I was checked in within few minutes and was provided with a double room on 11th floor as requested. The room was just as I had reviewed together with the whole hotel. A fabulous property centrally located with all amenities within walking distance. A great pool and Jacuzzi's on the roof and a fabulous spa with very friendly staff whom maintain the facilities immaculately. I tried the breakfast on the first morning, which for AED128 or £26 for breakfast is a bit too expensive. However the food was OK with choice of western, far east and Indian foods and an omelette bar. My flight was not till mid night, so the staff were very kind and allowed me to utilize the facilities (pool, spa, gym etc) for the rest of the day. Overall I was happy with my stay and would book again for the location, staff and well maintained property.

Show more
Kaushik , United Kingdom
Al Raha Beach Hotel
8.7 Excellent
Based on 337 reviews

Great WiFi. Great staff. Large rooms.Approx 15 mins from Abu Dhabi airport. Free shuttle to Abu Dhabi from the hotel.

Taxi to Abu Dhabi City approx 50AED. Taxi to Yas Island approx 30AED. Off Licence in the Hotel. Attached to a shopping mall. Little else within walking distance in the area. You have to get taxis or drive to everything.McGettigans pub next door is a decent enough pub for food and drink. Hotel bar is very nice but expensive.The pool area is also very nice and at night they have music.One tip. We booked online with Agoda. Not a well known site in Europe. The rates on it were much cheaper than other sites. I dont work for Agoda. Enjoy.

Show more
Brendan , Ireland
Bonnington Jumeirah Lakes Towers Hotel
8.2 Excellent
Based on 428 reviews

Great stay. staff were helpful. we checked in early (like 10am) with no fuss. Rooms are clean and modern and VERY fancy.

the pictures do not do the hotel justice. the ONLY downside is the pool is on the 11th floor and the view is a tiny bit disappointing (buildings). Not looking at the beach or anything. But this was a minor. the beach is £4 in a taxi or 30 minute walk. i would definitely go back to this hotel. if you have never been to dubai and want to be confident that you're staying in a good hotel, in a nice location, you cannot go wrong here. tip: dont order breakfast as part of your package (pay as you go)...it saves you money as you are more than likely not going to wake up until midday anyway.

Show more
obi , United Kingdom
Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach
8.6 Excellent
Based on 334 reviews

Our stay was very nice. The view of the ocean from the balcony was great minus the construction going on.

We were able to see The Palm as well. We definitely enjoyed the free wi-fi. The staff was very polite and courteous. The bed was cozy. The room size was average. We did not experience the private check in or check out as stated. The night life was very busy. There were plenty of restaurants on the strip as well as shopping. Traffic trying to leave the hotel was congested due to the construction.

Show more
TERESA , United States
AlSalam Hotel Suites and Apartments
7.9 Very good
Based on 608 reviews

Mahmood , Pakistan
Anantara Eastern Mangroves Hotel & Spa
8.9 Excellent
Based on 299 reviews

Check in, sat us at a sofa and table while they checked us in. 10 minutes or so later, check in was complete, then a small drink arrives as we are trying to get to our room.

Room was very pleasant, although there was a water stain on the ceiling. Pool area was excellent, pleasant back ground music, impeccably clean, but unable to get any service there without going off to find someone, constant over flight of aircraft and military helicopters to and from Al Bateen airfield, not at all relaxing. asked for food at pool side, "oh no, not for another hour, but you can go to your room or a resturant". despite the hotel being seemingly empty, we were unable to book a decent time in the spa, so we drove to the Shangri La. lunch in the resturant, shown to a table in a 20% full resturant, food still on the floor below the table, but rather than show us to another table, they asked us to stand while they cleaned..... we moved ourselves. The Thai resturant is excellent, the staff attentive, the food and suroundings were faultless. the whole experiance, although ok, left me feeling a bit frustrated and next time, i will stay in the Shangri La.

Show more
Nicholas , United Kingdom
Dubai International Airport Hotel
8.3 Excellent
Based on 1357 reviews

Despite our plane arriving late, we never saw our hotel escort, so didn't get fast tracked through security and then had to find our way to the hotel.

We were upgraded to a junior suite, which includes access tot he hotel executive lounge - offering 24h complimentary food and drinks (including beer and wine!) as well as a buffet breakfast; and the room had a massage chair!!! Unfortunately we had to change rooms 3 times before finding one with a functioning air conditioner (all others seemed to be locked on 'freezing'). Otherwise staff were very accommodating, polite and attentive.

Show more
Lisa , Australia
Donatello Hotel
8.1 Excellent
Based on 492 reviews

This hotel is interesting and has benefits to stay versus others close by. There is a lovely breakfast, lounge and pub all in building ~ with bands and fun.

The Emirates Mall and subway are close to walk 5~10 minutes, but i booked this for steam and sauna and these with shower were a mess ~ and seemed to have beena few years since their use. I was pretty upset about this for i didn't book the Ibis because this had a steam room. Most everything was lovely at a 3 or 3.5 star level but the pool and spa were . .ghettoband misleading. Boo ... so this is about a 7 right now or 3 star per facilities overall. Rooms are big and nice though. Maybe maintenance will help make some changes ~ for staff and doormen are super amazing, same for staff who work so hard in the morning for breakfast with crazy tourists.

Show more
Kierstan , United States
Pearl Creek hotel
8.2 Excellent
Based on 155 reviews

The lone staff member handling check-ins/check-outs at this 15 story (200+ rooms) was clearly overworked to death.

At first she could find my booking and had to make countless phone calls. I waited over an hour to find out that "someone" omitted to enter my reservation into their system! In the end "they made up for their mistake and gave me a splendid room on the top floor (15th floor) overlooking the creek...simply wow! The only thing which is definitely wrong with the splendid room is the "overcrowded" tiny minibar! What a pity! Why invest in a 5* air-conditioning system but provide the smallest fridge I have ever seen!

Show more
Madjid , Canada
Gloria Hotel & Apartments Dubai
8 Very good
Based on 547 reviews

It was an excellent stay. Had two small kids and had booked the sea view suite was it was perfect. Two bedrooms with ample space and views.

Staff were very quick to respond and I will definitely return. Location is close to Hotel Atlantis /Palm Jumeriah / Emirates Mall / Beach and Marina walk. Most of these have free shuttle. Taxis and hotel cars were easy to get and metro station bang opposite. Food was excellent and the servings very generous. Kids play area was well maintained. A convenience store inside the hotel+ spa. Nothing to complain!!!

Show more
GOPALAKRISHNAN , India
Pearl City Suites
7.8 Very good
Based on 234 reviews

one of the best locations to stay in dubai. excellent environment all around. deira city center across the road has most of the top brand shops, a food court containing all the major food chains, carrefour supermarket, children play area, etc.

on other side of the road you have access to low cost markets like day-2-day and green house. also, you have access to masjid and a nice park on the back side of the hotel. also we have ticketing offices nearby. about the hotel, it has nice and wide airy rooms, great facilities, very courteous staff, nice views and sitting areas.

Show more
MUSLEH , Pakistan
Asiana Hotel
8.5 Excellent
Based on 817 reviews

The location, the facilities, the food and house keeping is good. The receptionist staff during check in are very kind and polite.

But the night receptionist staff and manager are very insconsiderate, impolite and heartless regarding our concern. After we had fun at Makati comedy bar i asked the receptionist staff and manager if one of my friend can stay as a guest for 4 hrs (2am-6am）since the metro is closed and she is a female. Too far for her to go to accomodation alone by taxi. The manager and the receptionist want us to pay 320dhs for another room since we are already 3 in the room. The family room which I eventually got was nice, but, the two tv's in the room (one in the living room and one in the bedroom) were tiny, and the channels didnt work. 80% of the channels were in Arabic, and the few international ones didnt work or had reception so bad, you couldnt watch. I also noted that the buildings have 'settled', as they do, but this leaves gaps in window frames and doors... Best thing, the staff. always trying to help and being so polite and attentive. Rooms are big, and pleasant. Facilities (when they arent closed down!!) would be lovely too. Restaurants (that were open) are insanely expensive. A small meal for two in the Thai restaurant was AED 585! Thats 75% of the room charge! Show more Conan , United Kingdom Bab Al Shams Desert Resort and Spa 8.6 Excellent Based on 276 reviews We just went for one night but it should have been more as the atmosphere of the place took hold of us and made departure very difficult. Definitely a place for relaxation with its myriad of little places to sit quietly and read or just talk to your partner. we were celebrating our Ruby wedding Anniversary so it gave us that opportunity to enjoy our time together. The staff were very helpful and thoughtful and were even more so when they discovered our reason for being there, going the extra sand-dune to make our stay special. With lots of activities for those so inclined to take part, this is not just a 'couples' hotel but the presence of children enjoying themselves wasn't detraction for those who wanted to be quiet. Sitting at the rooftop bar to watch the sun set was a particularly attractive feature, as was the sunken firepit around which you could just sit and relax into the night, while watching the stars overhead. Our room was well designed with all amenities and the bed was just so so comfortable Show more Jeffrey , United Kingdom One&Only Royal Mirage 8.6 Excellent Based on 71 reviews The stay with the One and Only was excellent. All staff and facilities are top-notch and stand up to other 5-star elite resorts in the world. Highly recommend the Beach Bar and Grille for dinner. We also took advantage of the opportunity to take a boat cruise over to the One and Only 'The Palm' for dinner--complimentary as a guest with a dinner booking in the other One and Only property. The only negative thing I can say about the hotel is that it is beginning to show its age. At times, this adds to the classic/classy feel of the property, but some areas are beginning to show real wear (wood and plaster cracking, mismatched pain patching on exterior). Still a magnificent hotel. Show more Peter , United States Hilton Dubai Jumeirah 8.2 Excellent Based on 213 reviews we arrived very early morning after long haul flight having asked for early checkin. on arrival we were told there were no rooms till 2pm but if we were willing to pay more they could find a suite for us. this we did and the room was fantastic with great views across the beach and sea. staff were very pleasant and we had access to the executive lounge. having come from singapore where we staying in the hilton where there was free wifi, champagne etc in the lounge upon going into this hilton there was no free wifi anywhere and drinks were limited. we also did not know that dubai is very limited as to where you can have a drink with your meal and the only places you can do this is in the hotels which are very expensive. the area around the hotel is very congested with traffic as it is located on the walk and it can take some time if you are using taxis to get around. there is no information about the hotel in the room and you had to find out what was there by wandering around. Show more Elizabeth , United Kingdom Al Hamra Residence and Village 7.7 Very good Based on 715 reviews Stayed at village resort facing pleasant garden view. Reception desk staff was very generous to upgrade the room and provide assistance to show all facilities and access (beach access though adjacent property). Good location for walk around specially at golf court & Al Hamra Mall. But bathroom didn't light up and was not solved overnight, so just managed the night with cell phone light. May be technician not available at evening/night and so my suggestion to resort management to provide alternative arrangement such as charger light. Anyway, overall experience was pleasant and good value of money. Show more Mahmudul , United Arab Emirates The Cove Rotana Resort Ras Al Khaimah 8 Very good Based on 217 reviews We booked a Classic Twin Room and arrived at the hotel around 1PM. We requested for an early check-in once available. To our surprise, the lady receptionist told us that we were able to avail of a free upgrade to a premium room (villa), she showed me the location of the room and that it overlooked the lagoon and the beach. We were very excited. She asked if we were willing to wait until the room is ready. We said we will wait and so we sat at the lobby. Past 2PM and we were asked if, instead of waiting, we would settle for a classic room instead. We decided to wait for the premium room to be ready since she already confirmed the location and we were too excited. 3PM came and there was no update. Finally around 3:30 my husband followed up the room. She came back after 3:45 to tell us we can check-in the classic room since the premium room was not available! Very disappointing. Overpromising a customer is not customer service. Checking out also took a lot of time. We were told that the buggy service would come in 15 minutes, and we waited for more than an hour. Show more Kriska , Philippines Radisson Blu Resort Fujairah 8.2 Excellent Based on 224 reviews My stay at this hotel was not the best. My biggest complaint was regarding the noise level of slamming doors in the hallway which kept me awake. There were other minor issues such as our curtains wouldn't close, the mini-bar wasn't restocked, and the clock was missing, but not enough problems to cause the visit to be a total disaster. However, the hotel management took our noise complaint very seriously and offered to make amends for the inconvenience. The hotel staff is excellent which kind of makes up for the inconveniences. Not sure I would stay again, but I did appreciate the consideration of the employees. Show more Jeana , United States Desert Palm Dubai Hotel 8.3 Excellent Based on 86 reviews Our stay at the desert palm was for my birthday and it really was faultless and we are both extremely fussy guests. All of the staff that we encountered couldnt do enough to help and assist while not becoming overbearing. The room, pool, spa were all stunning - and any one considering a getaway break from Dubai should definately add this hotel to their shortlist Show more Leonard , United Kingdom Oceanic Khorfakkan Resort & Spa 8.1 Excellent Based on 171 reviews Firstly it is false advertised as it is not located in Fujairah but in Sharjah which means there is no alcohol served at all. Staff is absolutely terrible as you have to call them to your table to order a drink and then have to wait to order a meal. You will be better off to skip the breakfast all together as on one day there are only minimal options available due to the pots being empty. The next day there were no hot items available which leaves you with fruit and pastries even though it is buffet breakfast. When asked about the poor selection available,all you got back from a rude staff member was that we should have asked if we wanted any hot items. Staff lack personal interaction,training and ability to speak a acceptable level of english. Only thing going for this place is the pool and the beach that is close. Show more Albert , South Africa Coral Beach Resort 8.2 Excellent Based on 182 reviews I stayed at this hotel with my husband for 7 days and I had a great time. Our room was a good size with beach view and a mini bar. I loved the beach and the pool. They also had billiards so that you can play. They had activities for their guest to do if they wanted to. Free towels and free shuttle service to the mall and dubai. They also have a barbecue night at the beach which me and my husband enjoyed it was a buffet type barbecue where you get appetizers and also desert. The food at the restuarant was great. Housekeeping cleaned our room every night. There were no noise at night so we were able to sleep peacefully. I cant wait to go back there again. Show more liza , United States Danat Jebel Dhanna Resort 8.3 Excellent Based on 113 reviews i had a short but a very pleasing stay. the hotel is away for the city clutter and provides a calm and a relaxing environment. the room had a beautiful sea view. the hotel's beach is very good with one of the best beaches in uae. the room was spacious and the morning breakfast in the restaurant was good with a lot of variety. overall i had an enjoyable stay. Show more sana , United Arab Emirates Roda Beach Resort 7.7 Very good Based on 17 reviews Anantara Sir Bani Yas Island Al Sahel Villa Resort 9.1 Exceptional Based on 21 reviews Bahi Ajman Palace Hotel 8.1 Excellent Based on 135 reviews The stay at the Ajman Palace Hotel was great in all aspects the rooms were clean and quiet. the breakfast was suberb. Love the beach and the swimming pools were amazing. The staff are friendly; However what I disliked was that i had tried calling the concierge at night many times to ask them to provide me a blanket but no one answered and in the morning i even asked for a tooth brush kit and they said they would provide it I waited for an hour and no one responded. I hope this could be considered. Show more Nataliane , India Marjan Island Resort & Spa managed by Accor Hotels 8.2 Excellent Based on 210 reviews Stay was better than what we expected, nice sea view of the room, good service every where. But few things that was little disappointing the inside heated pool was not warm enough to swim. The lunch at AL LIWAN restaurant was a total disaster & food was cold & not tasty & over rated & also expensive! They charged us Aed 150.00 per person same like the outside guest no difference!! The breakfast in the same restaurant was really good in the next day though. Other than that we were very happy & the kids were thrilled. Thanks for the staff & a special thanks to Ken from the reservations he was very sweet & helpful. Show more Ahmad , United States Anantara Desert Islands Resort & Spa 8.5 Excellent Based on 58 reviews We have discovered the wildlife reserve through a safari tour late in the vening when the heat is not too high. You can see the animals very closely and this is a different experience than visiting a zoo. We enjoyed the hotel facilities and the swimming pool facing the sea and the desert beach. The fitness room is wonderful with great view on the garden and the sea. The rooms are quite large with nice balcony facing the sea. Very romantic place. Show more LEMAIRE , France Danat Al Ain Resort 7.7 Very good Based on 289 reviews I always read the reviews every time I travel to some place. I came to Danat on a week day so the place is pretty quiet, not that busy as opposed to what I heard which happens during the weekends. It's a good place to relax and unwind and get away from the hustle and bustle of Dubai. I actually appreciate not hearing the car horns and planes overhead during the night. Al Ain covers a wide area, you would definitely need a car or a cab in order to go from one place to another. Danat is near to everywhere: malls, restaurants etc. And the cab is cheaper compared to Dubai, it doesn't have a minimum rate whatsoever which is nice. Overall, the place is good. Needs improvement, yes. I'm positive they're doing everything they can to satisfy their clients and make them come back. Show more Sharon , Philippines Tilal Liwa Hotel 8.3 Excellent Based on 76 reviews A bit isolated,about 10 km from nearest town but great for privacy and the hotel has everything you'll need. I had 2 rooms,one with a balcony and the other without.I woild recommend that you take one with a balcony for that leisurely setting and one that faces the pool for its superb setting.own transport would make it easier to go see the camels at your convenience but early mornings is recommended. Other than the camels, you can expect undisturbed time with your loved one/ones in this superb setting. Show more Mohd , Malaysia Le Royal Meridien Beach Resort and Spa Hotel 8.7 Excellent Based on 58 reviews The Royal Meridien is centrally located within the Dubai Marina area, and has an excellent beach front. The pool and gym/spa facilities are large, varied, spacious and open 24/7. Service from all hotel staff was flawless. Eating options are overall mediocre - the breakfast buffet is large and satisfactory, but other restaurant options are both limited and uninspiring. The Dubai Marina area has little in the way of food options outside any of the hotels. But easy to explore other restaurants walking to the other nearby hotels in the Marina. Show more Daniel , United States Radisson Blu Resort Sharjah 7.4 Very good Based on 59 reviews We went into the room, which was good size wise but bad otherwise in every aspect. The furniture was humid and the room smelled of humidity. We were attending a wedding in the same hotel so we took the room to get ready and be close to the event. Our hair was miserable because every time we started blow drying it, it would get ruined and wet from the humid atmosphere. The toilet was really old, which is fine because it's a old hotel, so it is expected. We didn't have time to complain because we were getting ready for the wedding but afterwards we did and the staff was very helpful and moved us to another room which was much better. The staff in general is very friendly. Breakfast food was good. Show more Sara , Canada Emirates Park Resort 7.7 Very good Based on 271 reviews The apartment/chalet we occupied was facing the animals enclosure comprising of (only) 1 young giraffe, 2 zebras, two dozens of oryxes (endangered species) and some smaller living souls of feathered type. The outside veranda has excellent partial (from aside only) privacy, directly facing the animals. Noise levels from outside in the living room - no issues. Outside odors - completely bearable. A staff guy sold us around 2 kg of carrots and green leaves to feed the animals - all for 30 AED (sounds too much but fine for once). You may always drag some more from outside but first please consult staff members what is most appropriate for the wildlife - giraffe showed particular fondness towards carrots and lettuce. :) Furniture not 1st class but well maintained. For food visit the rural restaurant right next to Zoo eternal entrance/exit, huge choice of local stuff and unbeatable prices; new food court with Subway & basic Indian cuisine. ASK the staff about the Zoo daily program. Deerfields mall in the very village for all the rest and few km away - Yas Island with all of its great parks to mandatory visit. Hotel pool - enjoyable, ATM on site & also kids dental center. :) Show more Ivan , Bulgaria Fairmont Fujairah Beach Resort 9 Excellent Based on 18 reviews JA Jebel Ali Beach Hotel 8.1 Excellent Based on 99 reviews I was there on business and the resort caters much more to a family/couples clientele. Breakfast buffet was a very nice surprise as there was a large variety and quality was well above the norm for the area. The poolside and sports bar outlets were however mediocre at best; food was acceptable and service was marginally acceptable. The hotel had several issues with automatic doors not functioning properly and elevators (all) had issues with doors closing, elevator engaging after button pushed, doors not opening when arriving at floor and generally had the feeling of being old and poorly maintained. The hotel was very appealing on the surface but, maintenance goes further than a shine. Show more James , United States XVA Art Hotel 8.8 Excellent Based on 133 reviews i felt very comfortable during my stay in the xva arthotel! walking the way to the entrance trough the sand-castle-like heritage village feels like a fairy-tale. once inside, you immediately enter the beautiful courtyard and meet the friendly staff. i love the little gallery inside the hotel and actually my room was a little gallery too! decorated with nice little sculptures and paintings. the artbooks, watercooker, nicely assorted soaps, towels, bathing-wrap, the little plant in the bathroom and ofcourse the cool aircon gave me a perfect time after a extreme hot day in dubai! everything was very clean and exceptionally well decorated with nice furniture and artpieces. staff was really helpfull and the breakfast was good! despite i could stay only one day in dubai, but i will return and book this hotel again for sure! i would recommend this hotel to everybody, especially to people who prefer personal atmosphere to the anonymous mega-hotels which can be found in dubai. in my opinion for art-lovers it is a must to go here! Show more Leonie , Netherlands Ahmedia Heritage Guesthouse 8.2 Excellent Based on 153 reviews it was good stay in dubai. location is not the best, but inside the hotel is commendable. large rooms with touch of arabian cultural eliment, nicely furnished. zele's smile and her total submission to customer service must be remembred. the hotel is new, so many things are still to be added. it is a bit too pricy, given the location and lmited access to the property. a taxi or car cannot reach the hotel, must get out of the main road and need to walk about 50-75m. next door ahmadia school museum is a must watch, it is free. good food too, but only made to your order. only 6 rooms they have, but further 9 rooms are almost ready to go. so, overall i give 75 out of 100 points. Show more Don , Australia Barjeel Heritage Guesthouse 8.4 Excellent Based on 78 reviews at first we have difficulty finding the hotel because we arrived nighttime & the signage wasnt that clear. at daytime we realized that it was centrally located, at the front you can enjoy views of the dubai creek, heritage village was just at the neighborhood, the metro station was just 2minutes walk, the bus station just a mere 5 minutes walk, & the shindagha city center is just opposite the road. The room is spacious, arabic/indian-inspired bed & decors. my partner who lives in UK told me that he really felt the old, arabic vibe in this hotel & not the usual metropolis dubai. staff were nice, they helped me with my luggages & explained everything to me. Breakfast was made to order, so you have to place your order the night before so they can prepare it in the morning. There was this one time we forgot to place our breakfast order but the kitchen staff still accomodated our requests in the morning. it is very affordable considering the location & the cultural vibe & neighborhood you are getting. Highly recommend this guest house. Show more jenniffer , Philippines Gold Plaza Guest House 3 Review score Based on 1 reviews Orient Guest House 7.8 Very good Based on 110 reviews As a very frequent visitor of Dubai I stayed in many hotels, some good, some bad. Orient Guest House is definitely one of the most disappointing experiences. It could easily be turned into a real jewel, boutique hotel style, kind of a small budget Bab al Shams and maybe it was when it opened. Since then apparently nobody cared about the site at all. Some examples: The light fixtures were broken, some with exposed cables, the faucets are not fixed and do not work properly. The interior is old in a filthy sense, the bathroom is more than ready for a complete makeover. For some reason someone installed a pink Baskin Robbins cart in the picturesque yard, very odd and destroying the entire ambiance. Breakfast was mediocre, which is not uncommon in the UAE, but the grim and unfriendly staff is. I would come back if they did a major refurbishment and once the real thing looks like the images on their webpage. But not before. Show more Oliver , Germany Al Dar Darak Marina by Jannah 8.2 Excellent Based on 124 reviews Dubai City Accommodation 9.2 Exceptional Based on 9 reviews Al Sheraa Guest House 3.1 Review score Based on 17 reviews La Verda Suites & Villas Dubai Marina 8.8 Excellent Based on 183 reviews Dubai was chosen as an ideal place for a winter sun break but although we had nice warm days the skies remained overcast for the whole of our stay. Luckily we stayed at La Verda apartments which overlook the Marina and there were great walks on our doorstep. We ate at the Barhar restaurant where the food really was delicious and reasonably priced. A major highlight of our stay was the excellent customer service - friendly, attentive and genuinely pleased to help. I would definitely recommend La Verda to anyone looking to spend time in Dubai. Show more Susan , United Kingdom Abidos Hotel Apartment Dubailand 7.8 Very good Based on 299 reviews It was a nice, clean, comfortalbe hotel with large rooms, comfortable bed in a quiet location. If you are looking for a place that hos no road noise and away from it all but a short drive to the city (15 mins then this is the place to go. Only real issue is it seemed like the walls were thin, could hear the person in the next apartment cough. The value for t/money was a definite trade-off. I booked a sone room apartment but they were out when I checked in so i ended up with a 2 bed, 3.5 bath apartment for under $100. Freakin awsome and with breakfast it came out to around $100. Well worth it!!! Show more Brett , United States Jannah Resort & Villas Ras Al Khaimah 7.7 Very good Based on 44 reviews Roda Metha Suites 8.5 Excellent Based on 74 reviews staff (particulary the Filipina receptionist) has a rude attitude towards our guests. we informed their staff when we checked in that we will be having our guests for 2-3hrs since it is our anniversary dinner/party but she harrased our guests. Show more leonisa , Philippines Hafez Hotel Apartments 5.3 Review score Based on 66 reviews check in and out is good and fast-not much hassle, the recep also not that very fierce according to other comment from users. BUT, the room is DIRTY. it is BIG, but its very dirty-esp the bed sheet, where people `hair` is anywhere. this is the only bad comment from me, others is good. very near to mrt, quite place. from airport is just 15 minutes, no need to take taxi whc will cost you around 25 dirham, mrt will cost only 4.5 dirham. BUT, beware on FRIDAY bcos everything open at 130PM, include the MRT. Show more Nasir , Malaysia Noon Hotel Apartments 7.6 Very good Based on 82 reviews The hotel is a few minutes walk to Mall of the Emirates. The location is perfect because the hotel is easy to get to, and it's close to the highway, so getting around UAE from there is perfect. I am so happy we didn't choose to stay in Deira area, as it was very busy and crowded when we drove there to the Gold Souk. We easily accessed the highways from Noon Hotel Apartments to go to Al Ain Zoo. Also, it's only about 15 minutes from Global Village, which would have taken a very long time to drive from Bur Dubai or Deira. Our 2 BR apartment was clean and big enough for 3 adults and 3 children. Both rooms had King sized beds. I would have preferred 2 twin beds in one of the bedrooms. There is everything you need in the kitchen to make your own breakfast. We would definitely stay there again.
